TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PageCatalogPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart
Public NotInheritable Class PageCatalogPart Inherits CatalogPart

summary.span: 提供目錄，保存使用者已在單一 Web 組件頁面上關閉之所有 控制項 (以及包含在 區域中的其他伺服器控制項) 的參考，這樣可以讓使用者將已關閉的控制項加回頁面上。

span.span: Provides a catalog that keeps references to all controls (and other server controls contained in zones) that a user has closed on a single Web Parts page, which enables users to add the closed controls back to the page.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別 Web 組件頁面上提供一個非常特定的用途： 它做為頁面類別目錄，以維護任何先前加入至頁面，使用者已關閉，以便使用者可以將它們新增至網頁的控制項。The class serves one very specific purpose on a Web Parts page: it acts as a page catalog to maintain any controls previously added to the page that a user has closed, so that the user can add them back to the page. 時，才在網頁中目錄的顯示模式，可讓使用者加入和移除控制項在頁面上的特殊檢視，此控制項是可見。This control is visible only when a Web page is in catalog display mode, a special view that enables users to add and remove controls on the page. 新增控制項加入您的頁面，如果您想要為使用者提供關閉並重新開啟控制項的彈性。Add a control to your page if you want to provide users with the flexibility of closing and reopening controls. 如果您的頁面不允許使用者完全關閉的控制項，則不需要加入控制項加入頁面。If your page does not allow users to close controls at all, there is no need to add a control to your page. 只有已關閉的控制項加入至頁面類別目錄。Only closed controls are added to the page catalog. 已關閉的控制項具有數個屬性：A closed control has several attributes: - 不在頁面上可見。It is not visible on the page. - 它不會轉譯頁面上。It is not rendered on the page. - 不會參與頁面生命週期階段。It does not participate in page life-cycle phases. 不同於刪除知識庫，這會永久移除頁面時關閉的控制項。Closing a control is different from deleting it, which permanently removes it from the page. 使用者可以重新開啟已關閉的控制項執行個體從頁面目錄，但使用者刪除控制項之後，他或她可以永遠不會復原該特定執行個體。A user can reopen a closed control instance from a page catalog, but after a user deletes a control, he or she can never recover that specific instance. 最常見且便利的方式加入至頁面的控制項是藉由宣告頁面保存格式。The most common and convenient way to add a control to a page is by declaring it in page persistence format. 如同使用任何宣告式控制項，控制項必須宣告適當的 ASP.NET 標記項目內容中，在網頁上。As with any declarative control, a control must be declared within the proper context of ASP.NET markup elements on a Web page. 工作的程式碼範例，如何宣告的控制在網頁中，請參閱本主題的範例 > 一節。For a working code example of how to declare a control in a Web page, see the Example section of this topic. 您必須在頁面中新增下列序列宣告式項目：You must add the following sequence of declarative elements to the page: 1. ``必須宣告項目，和子系``項目必須新增至它無法包含任何宣告區域中的控制項。An `` element must be declared, and a child `` element must be added to it to contain any controls declared in the zone. 2. ``項目必須新增為子系``項目。An `` element must be added as a child of the `` element. 可能也有其他為的子元素宣告控制項``項目，包括或控制項。There might also be other controls declared as child elements of the `` element, including or controls. 類別有只有一個可用的屬性，屬性，覆寫基底屬性，讓預設標題可以提供網頁類別目錄，如果未提供值。The class has only one usable property, the property, which overrides the base property so that a default title can be provided for the page catalog if no value is supplied. 剩餘屬性類別覆寫繼承的屬性，但實際上不會用來呈現控制項。The remaining properties for the class override the inherited properties, but are not actually used for rendering the control. 覆寫，則只有以便可以對它們設定特殊的程式碼屬性，從設計工具，例如隱藏[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]。They are overridden only so that special code attributes can be set on them to hide them from design tools like [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]. 您不應該使用這些隱藏的屬性，因為它們不會影響轉譯。You should not use these hidden properties, because they have no effect on rendering. 由於它們隱藏的 IntelliSense 和 Visual Studio 中的 [屬性] 窗格可協助開發人員避免不小心使用它們。The fact that they are hidden from IntelliSense and the Properties pane in Visual Studio helps developers avoid using them by mistake. 所有隱藏的屬性會註明其各自的說明主題中。All these hidden properties are noted as such in their respective Help topics. 類別也有數個重要的方法。The class also has several important methods. 方法擷取物件給每個控制項在頁面目錄中，可讓控制項來顯示每個伺服器控制項的相關資訊，而不需要建立該控制項的執行個體。The method retrieves a object for each control in the page catalog, which enables a control to display information about each server control without having to create an instance of that control. 另一個方法是方法。Another method is the method. 這個方法會取得特定的執行個體傳遞給方法的描述為基礎的控制項。This method gets an instance of a particular control, based on the description passed to the method. ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 根據預設，此控制項呈現標記可能不符合協助工具標準，例如網頁內容的指導方針 1.0 (WCAG) 優先權 1 指導方針。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 如需對這個控制項的協助工具支援的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用以宣告方式在網頁上的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control declaratively on a Web page. 這個範例有四個部分：This example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 網頁包含控制項，控制項和控制項。A Web page that contains a control, a control, and a control. - 原始程式碼檔，其中包含兩個自訂控制項。A source code file that contains two custom controls. - 當您載入瀏覽器中的，此範例的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 這個程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更網頁上的顯示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 如需詳細資料會顯示此控制項中模式和原始碼的說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是 Web 網頁。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 在頁面的頂端是兩個`register`指示詞，其中一個使用者控制項，一個用於編譯過的元件包含兩個自訂控制項。At the top of the page are two `register` directives, one for the user control and one for the compiled component that contains the two custom controls. 請注意此頁面具有的宣告式參考控制項，巢狀方式置於適當的宣告式元素的階層中此主題的 < 備註 > 一節所述。Notice that the page has a declarative reference to the control, nested within the proper hierarchy of declarative elements as described in the Remarks section of this topic. 另外還有``元素，其中包含參考標準 asp.net控制項和兩個自訂都是使用者可以從目錄選取的控制項的控制項。There is also an `` element, which contains references for a standard ASP.NET control and the two custom controls, all of which are the controls that users can select from the catalog. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview/CS/PageCatalogPartCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview/VB/PageCatalogPartVB.aspx#1)] 程式碼範例的第三個部分是兩個的原始程式碼控制項。The third part of the code example is the source code for the two controls. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 如需示範這兩個編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#6)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，選取**目錄模式**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項切換至類別目錄的模式。When you load the page in a browser, select **Catalog Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to catalog mode. 在類別目錄的模式下，您可以看到可將其加入至頁面的控制項。In catalog mode, you can see the controls that are available to be added to the page. 加入一個控制項，然後使用**顯示模式**返回頁面，即可瀏覽模式的下拉式清單控制項。Add one of the controls, then use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to return the page to browse mode. 按一下控制項，其中的標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號），然後按一下**關閉**關閉控制項。Click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and click **Close** to close the control. 將網頁傳回給目錄的模式，並注意您關閉的控制項現在會出現在頁面目錄中，而且可將其加入至網頁。Return the page to catalog mode, and notice that the control you closed now appears in the page catalog, and is available to be added back to the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式是預設值，則沒有建構函式宣告中類別，因此沒有特殊的工作會執行建立類別的新執行個體時。The constructor is a default; no constructor is declared in the class and hence no special tasks are carried out when a new instance of the class is created. .NET Framework 內部使用建構函式建立類別的執行個體。The .NET Framework uses the constructor internally to create an instance of the class. 它是可行的但不太可能，您必須使用建構函式，以程式設計方式在自己的程式碼。It is possible, but unlikely, that you will need to use the constructor programmatically in your own code. 控制項的用途是網頁程式開發人員將它加入至網頁以宣告方式在執行階段。The intended use of the control is for page developers to add it to a page declaratively at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性成員的身分控制，表示未設定呈現控制項的 Web 組件控制項內任何位置使用。The property, as a member of the control, is not used anywhere within the Web Parts control set for rendering the control. 因此，您不應該使用這個屬性。設定具有不會影響轉譯。Therefore, you should not use this property; setting it has no effect on rendering. 若要防止開發人員使用這個屬性，會在其上隱藏在 Visual Studio 中設定程式碼屬性。To prevent developers from using this property, code attributes are set on it to hide it in Visual Studio. 當您使用控制在 Visual Studio屬性不是顯示在 [屬性] 窗格或 IntelliSense。When you work with a control in Visual Studio, the property is not visible in the Properties pane or IntelliSense. 如果您想要使用這個屬性，您需要建立自訂的類別繼承自類別。If you want to use this property, you need to create a custom class that inherits from the class. 自訂的類別可以使用繼承屬性，或覆寫它，並變更其行為。The custom class can either use the inherited property as it is, or override it and change its behavior. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性成員的身分控制，表示未設定呈現控制項的 Web 組件控制項內任何位置使用。The property, as a member of the control, is not used anywhere within the Web Parts control set for rendering the control. 因此，您不應該使用這個屬性。設定具有不會影響轉譯。Therefore, you should not use this property; setting it has no effect on rendering. 若要防止開發人員使用這個屬性，會在其上隱藏在 Visual Studio 中設定程式碼屬性。To prevent developers from using this property, code attributes are set on it to hide it in Visual Studio. 當您使用控制在 Visual Studio屬性不是顯示在 [屬性] 窗格或 IntelliSense。When you work with a control in Visual Studio, the property is not visible in the Properties pane or IntelliSense. 如果您想要使用這個屬性，您需要建立自訂的類別繼承自類別。If you want to use this property, you need to create a custom class that inherits from the class. 自訂的類別可以使用繼承屬性，或覆寫它，並變更其行為。The custom class can either use the inherited property as it is, or override it and change its behavior. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性成員的身分控制，表示未設定呈現控制項的 Web 組件控制項內任何位置使用。The property, as a member of the control, is not used anywhere within the Web Parts control set for rendering the control. 因此，您不應該使用這個屬性。設定具有不會影響轉譯。Therefore, you should not use this property; setting it has no effect on rendering. 若要防止開發人員使用這個屬性，會在其上隱藏在 Visual Studio 中設定程式碼屬性。To prevent developers from using this property, code attributes are set on it to hide it in Visual Studio. 當您使用控制在 Visual Studio屬性不是顯示在 [屬性] 窗格或 IntelliSense。When you work with a control in Visual Studio, the property is not visible in the Properties pane or IntelliSense. 如果您想要使用這個屬性，您需要建立自訂的類別繼承自類別。If you want to use this property, you need to create a custom class that inherits from the class. 自訂的類別可以使用繼承屬性，或覆寫它，並變更其行為。The custom class can either use the inherited property as it is, or override it and change its behavior. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供實作抽象基底方法宣告中類別。The method provides an implementation for the abstract base method declared in the class. 方法會傳回每個控制項的描述資訊的目錄中。The method returns description information for each control in a catalog. A物件包含有關的重要資訊控制項，包括其識別碼、 將控制項，以及繼承自的幾個重要屬性的值的物件參考類別，例如和。A object contains essential information about a control, including its ID, an object reference to the control, and the values of several important properties that are inherited from the class, such as and . 方法可改善效能。The method improves performance. 當建立目錄時，需要一些資訊其中的內容，包括標題、 描述、 圖示 （如果有的話） 和 id。 每個控制項When a catalog is created, it needs some information about each control it contains, including a title, a description, an icon (if one exists), and an ID. 而不必建立要取得這項資訊，每個控制項的執行個體呼叫會建立類別目錄的區域每個控制項將會在類別目錄和呼叫的方法會傳回只描述資訊控制項。Rather than having to create an instance of each control to get this information, a zone that creates a catalog calls the method for each control that will be in the catalog, and the call returns only the description information for the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. 這個範例有四個部分：This example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 原始程式碼檔，其中包含兩個自訂控制項。A source code file that contains two custom controls. - 網頁包含控制項和參考多個伺服器控制項的控制項。A Web page that contains a control and a control that references several server controls. 這個頁面也包含呼叫的事件處理程式碼方法。The page also contains the event-handling code that calls the method. - 當您載入瀏覽器中的，此範例的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 這個程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更網頁上的顯示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 如需詳細資料會顯示此控制項中模式和原始碼的說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是兩個自訂的原始碼控制項。The second part of the code example is the source code for the two custom controls. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 如需示範這兩個編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#6)] 此範例的第三個部分是包含網頁控制項。The third part of the example is the Web page that contains the control. 請注意，`Button1_Click`方法呼叫方法中，取得的說明控制項的頁面類別目錄中，並寫入標籤的詳細資料。Notice that the `Button1_Click` method calls the method, obtains the descriptions of the controls in the page catalog, and writes the details to a label. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/CS/PageCatalogPart_GetCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/VB/PageCatalogPart_GetVB.aspx#1)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，選取**目錄模式**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項切換至類別目錄的模式。When you load the page in a browser, select **Catalog Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to catalog mode. 在類別目錄的模式下，您可以看到可將其加入至頁面的控制項。In catalog mode, you can see the controls that are available to be added to the page. 將一或多個控制項加入至頁面上，，然後使用**顯示模式**返回頁面，即可瀏覽模式的下拉式清單控制項。Add one or more controls to the page, and then use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to return the page to browse mode. 按一下一或多個控制項的標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號），然後按一下**關閉**。Click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of one or more of the controls, and click **Close**. 返回頁面目錄模式，並請注意，您所關閉的控制項現在都會出現在頁面上的目錄中，而且可將其加入至網頁。Return the page to catalog mode, and notice that the control or controls you closed now appear in the page catalog, and are available to be added back to the page. 按一下**顯示 WebPart 描述**頁面類別目錄中之控制項的相關詳細資料寫入標籤 按鈕。Click the **Display WebPart descriptions** button to write the details about the controls in the page catalog to the label.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法傳回的參考控制其描述詳細資料相符的值物件傳遞至方法。The method returns a reference to a control whose description details match the values of the object passed into the method. 一般而言，這個方法會搭配方法，用來擷取類別目錄中的所有控制項的描述。Typically, this method is used together with the method, which is used to retrieve the descriptions of all the controls in the catalog. 個別控制項可以再擷取或操作所需藉由傳遞個別物件加入至方法。Individual controls can then be retrieved or manipulated as needed by passing individual objects to the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. 這個範例有四個部分：This example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 原始程式碼檔，其中包含兩個自訂控制項。A source code file that contains two custom controls. - 網頁包含控制項和參考多個伺服器控制項的控制項。A Web page that contains a control and a control that references several server controls. 這個頁面也包含呼叫的事件處理程式碼方法。The page also contains the event-handling code that calls the method. - 當您載入瀏覽器中的，此範例的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 這個程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更網頁上的顯示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 如需詳細資料會顯示此控制項中模式和原始碼的說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是兩個自訂的原始碼控制項。The second part of the code example is the source code for the two custom controls. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 如需示範這兩個編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#6)] 此範例的第三個部分是包含網頁控制項。The third part of the example is the Web page that contains the control. 請注意，`Button2_Click`方法取得的說明控制項在目錄中，呼叫方法來擷取網頁中的所有控制項目錄為集合，然後將這些控制項加入至網頁。Notice that the `Button2_Click` method obtains the descriptions of the controls in the catalog, calls the method to retrieve all the controls in the page catalog for a collection, and then adds those controls back to the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/CS/PageCatalogPart_GetCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/VB/PageCatalogPart_GetVB.aspx#1)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，選取**目錄模式**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項切換至類別目錄的模式。When you load the page in a browser, select **Catalog Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to catalog mode. 在類別目錄的模式下，您可以看到可將其加入至頁面的控制項。In catalog mode, you can see the controls that are available to be added to the page. 將一或多個控制項加入至頁面上，，然後使用**顯示模式**返回頁面，即可瀏覽模式的下拉式清單控制項。Add one or more controls to the page, and then use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to return the page to browse mode. 按一下一或多個控制項的標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號），然後按一下**關閉**。Click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of one or more of the controls, and click **Close**. 將網頁傳回給目錄的模式，並請注意，現在控制項或您所關閉的控制項出現在頁面目錄中，並可加入至網頁。Return the page to catalog mode, and notice that now the control or controls you closed appear in the page catalog, and are available to be added back to the page. 按一下**加入 WebPart 控制項**返回頁面，將控制項加入頁面類別目錄中的按鈕。Click the **Add WebPart Controls** button to add the controls in the page catalog back to the page. 使用**顯示模式**頁面返回一般瀏覽模式的下拉式清單控制項，則為您加入會在頁面上可見的控制項。Use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to return the page to normal browse mode; the controls you added are visible on the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性成員的身分控制，表示未設定呈現控制項的 Web 組件控制項內任何位置使用。The property, as a member of the control, is not used anywhere within the Web Parts control set for rendering the control. 因此，您不應該使用這個屬性。設定具有不會影響轉譯。Therefore, you should not use this property; setting it has no effect on rendering. 若要防止開發人員使用這個屬性，會在其上隱藏在 Visual Studio 中設定程式碼屬性。To prevent developers from using this property, code attributes are set on it to hide it in Visual Studio. 當您使用控制在 Visual Studio屬性不是顯示在 [屬性] 窗格或 IntelliSense。When you work with a control in Visual Studio, the property is not visible in the Properties pane or IntelliSense. 如果您想要使用這個屬性，您需要建立自訂的類別繼承自類別。If you want to use this property, you need to create a custom class that inherits from the class. 自訂的類別可以使用繼承屬性，或覆寫它，並變更其行為。The custom class can either use the inherited property as it is, or override it and change its behavior. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

summary.span: 取得或設定顯示在控制項標題列中的標題。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值會顯示在標題列控制控制項時顯示在類別目錄的模式。The property value is displayed in the title bar of a control when the control is visible in catalog mode. 控制項在頁面中宣告時，您可以透過設定屬性的值`Title`屬性。When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the property by using the `Title` attribute. 如果您未提供標題的值，特定文化特性的預設值用來描述此控制項可讓使用者編輯的屬性類型。If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the kind of properties that this control allows users to edit. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告式使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 下列來源的程式碼示範如何設定宣告式標記中控制項上的屬性。The following source code shows how to set the property on the control in declarative markup. 如果您未設定屬性，或如果指定空字串 ("")，會提供預設標題。If you do not set the property, or if you assign an empty string (""), a default title is supplied.
